name: naf
description: NAF (Not A Framework) - A ~2KB gzipped reactive framework for building SPAs without dependencies. Copy naf.ts directly into your project.

scripts.example: cd example && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.compress: npm run build && gzip -k -f dist/naf.min.js && brotli -k -f dist/naf.min.js

author: halfmonty
